origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_lease_info', 'description': 'This function provides detailed information about financial leasing, including business model, market size, competition landscape, risk control, and potential growth.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'leaseType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of lease, e.g., financial, operational.'}, {'name': 'marketAnalysis', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include market size and competition analysis.'}, {'name': 'riskAssessment', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include risk control analysis.'}, {'name': 'potentialGrowth', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to include potential growth assessment.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'leaseDetails', 'description': 'A comprehensive report on the requested leasing information.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_lease_info, 它的参数输入如下: 'leaseType'是'financial', 'marketAnalysis'、'riskAssessment'、'potentialGrowth'均设置为'true'.
